I don't remember Matt.  My impression is that it was a lot more than one would normally expect 8 big, glossy, expensive Japanese fittings books to be.  Thinking about it I can picture a fittings museum book shelf price card of Y960,000 or 690,000, but I wouldn't bet on it.  Maybe Alan or Craig knows what they go for these days.  The fittings museum was offering some significant discounts for cash book purchases toward the end.

Jim 



  How much was it ....... out of interest?

  - Matt
